title: Mediaeater Digest Vol. 30 No. 73
content:
Music Festivals Canceled This Year Reveal Rising Costs of Producing Large Events (Bloomberg)
SXSW Tried to Silence Critics with Bogus Trademark and Copyright Claims. EFF Fought Back. (EFF)
FCC Denies Starlink Low-Orbit Bid for Lower Latency (ieee.org)
A New Surge in Power Use Is Threatening U.S. Climate Goals (NYT)
OpenAI Made AI Videos for Us. These Clips Are Good Enough to Freak Us Out (WSJ) This clip  speaks to OpenAI corporate culture.
Artificial Intelligence Act: MEPs adopt landmark law (europa.eu)
author: MDG
